I specialize in Mathematical Physics

What is it all about?

The enterprize of Mathematical Physics is an endeavour towards understanding and encoding the fundamental principles of Nature in the language of Mathematics. This has been an astoundingly successful endeavour over the last few centuries in that we have been able to understand the workings of natural laws across a wide spectrum of phenomena-from the unimaginably tiny subatomic world to humongous and ever-increasing expance of cosmic spacetime-by using such mathematical equations.
